title: Karthus is silenced, litteraly
body: This might only be me, it might only be with the Pentakill skin but i remember a few games where I picked Karthus and he litteraly is quiet. Even my brother playing the same game noticed on his side. Again I havent experemented with this ATM but just throwin it out to get it some notice considering how ill played the guy is.{{champion:30}}

replies.body:
He's a bit hoarse from playing so many Pentakill gigs. D: We're working to get his voice restored! ^-^

(As a serious side note, it's affecting the base and all skins, not just Pentakill!)
